extendedInfo.description: The Pro version for your favorite custom notification creator!Notif Pro features:- Reminders!!- Notification editing- Android Beam support! Beam notifications straight into the notification drawer of another device- All 200 custom icons!- Notification Actions - ability to share to other apps straight from notification- Create notifications from Google Now Voice Search (say "note to self...")- Create notifications from other apps through the share intent- QuickNotif - create and clear notifications anywhere on your phone from your notification drawer- Lots more to comeNEW:Create notifications straight from Google Now Voice Search!  Simply say "Note to self blah blah blah..." and choose Notif Pro. You can choose to always create a Notif by setting it as your default. NEW:Notif History has been released! This will back up every text and list notification you create (even edits!) and store it in a nice layout. You can swipe to delete notifications or tap on them to re-create that notification! FYI, this will not save picture notifications. Just text and list :)Android Beam support! Tap on a notification (regular text only) to edit, but tap to another NFC-enabled phone to beam that notification right into the notification bar of the other phone!Create notifications hands-free with VoiceNotif! Just tap the microphone icon at the top and it will listen for a title and your content. It will create an expandable notification, just as if you typed it out yourself.Note: Updating the application will erase notifications. Sorry! I am working on a way around this.Note: If you are using a Sense device (HTC One X, for example), the UI will not expand any notifications except for the highest one. I cannot control this at all. Follow @notifapp on Twitter for support and announcements: http://www.twitter.com/notifappSubmit and vote on your most wanted features here: http://notif.uservoice.comPermissions explained:1. RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED -> Used to restore notifications on reboot2. NFC -> Used to Beam notifications3. VIBRATION -> Used for remindersChange log: http://goo.gl/3p4ZG

reviews.title: I must be confused on how to set it
reviews.comment: I keep setting a time reminder and saving it but it never alerts me.
reviews.author: Sergio Esteban Bustamante

reviews.title: App Works As Advertised
reviews.comment: Developer responded to crashing issue I was having on Note 2. He suggested I clear the data. After doing that the app works as it is supposed to. Thanks to the developer for his assistance and for an app that works as advertised. I have raised the star level.   Original Review in August 2013:  Recurring Notifications do not show in notification bar upon restart or power on. I must go to history and reload the notifications. Occasional crashes upon restart or power on. The concept is great. Once these bugs a
reviews.author: Barry Sachais

reviews.title: Fantastic app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a long time user of the lite version and been getting increasingly fed up for Google Now\'s unreliable reminders, so I figured it was worth slapping down some cash just for Notif\'s scheduled reminder feature...plus it\'s good to support developers of quality applications such as this of course! My only complaint is the app icon! Bring back the cube, it looks so much nicer on my main home screen! :)
reviews.author: Dave Harrison-Ward

reviews.title: Brilliant app. Gorgeous Holo UI
reviews.comment: I used the free version for sometime but I found myself using it a lot as it is a brilliant app for notifications and Lists. I had to get the pro for the additional features because I was using it so much. I asked for reminders and got it. In the list editing it would be neat if items can be crossed out once they are done (for shopping lists) But even without that it is still an amazing app. Good UI but I personally liked the old logo more. But it would be really harsh if I gave the app anything less than 5 stars.
reviews.author: Aaron Carvalho

reviews.title: Cool app, needs a little more functionality
reviews.comment: History is good, however it should be searchable. After a while you will have a huge history if you make lots of reminders. Also, would like a way to export the history somehow. (would really like to see this functionality)  App needs a more polish. I create a note  with reminder for 8/14/2013 and the reminder confirmation dialog says reminder set for 7/14/2013.  App should let you pick a default icon, or better yet a quick selection of maybe 4 or 9 icons (2x2 grid or 3x3 grid).   Inconsistent behavior when you tap on a notification. When you tap a text notification, a system dialog pops up (to edit). When you tap a list notification, it takes you to the app to edit. Should pick one or the other (I prefer app)  Giving this app 4 stars, it has potential to be a great reminder app
reviews.author: Tommy S

reviews.title: Freezes Every Time
reviews.comment: I love the app and how intuitive and smooth it is, but it crashes every time, without fail, when I try to add a new item into my list from the tool bar. Also, when I restart my phone, EVERY SINGLE previous list I\'ve had comes back up, unless I had remembered to clear my whole history folder. I kind of really wish I hadn\'t updated the app in the most recent one, because I wasn\'t having issues really before that. When all the issues are cleared up, would definitely be a 5 star app. Droid 4.
reviews.author: Hiroko Nishimura

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app, very useful! Reminders are a great update but I prefer the previous ui and icon..
reviews.author: Jarek Pyzik

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Works just as described!  I just took off a star. I HATE the new icon. The old one was one of my favorites. A fox? Horrible. Wth?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect...
reviews.comment: Very well designed UI, user friendly, clean and to the point. Developer communicates well, and updates are planned. Syncing between devices would be appreciated! = )
reviews.author: Josh Hess

reviews.title: Notable Replacement
reviews.comment: I was a Notable user. I am now a Notif Pro user. Nuff said.
reviews.author: Vontael Pineda

reviews.title: Best app of it\'s kind
reviews.comment: I have used the free version for a while, but I bought this one because I have definitely gotten my money\'s worth out of it! Great app, simple and to the point. One problem I see is that notifications get erased upon update. If you fix this 5 stars.
reviews.author: Alec Dent

reviews.title: Good but needs more work!
reviews.comment: Edit: dropped a star,  there are too many bugs in this app for it to be usable Imo.   1. When my phone reboots (galaxy s3), my whole note history is reloaded as swipeable notifications.    2. Also after a reboot,  none of my previous ongoing notifs return as ongoing.  They are all swipeable.   3. Still no way to edit notification priority on the fly.
reviews.author: Keri Ellis

reviews.title: Love the new icon!
reviews.comment: App looks awesome! New icon is a fox! Sick! Enjoyed much!
reviews.author: Roman Maximilian

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Incredibly useful and does what it does perfectly! I really am confused however about the new fox icon..  it seems irelevent (and I preferred the old icon) maybe someone can explain that link?
reviews.author: Jon-Cameron Bates

reviews.title: Such a fan of this.
reviews.comment: It really helps out in the strangest of places. Unfortunately, despite the fact that it helps out in the strangest of places, a strange fox staring into my soul in my app drawer isn\'t very comforting. I also rather liked the cube.
reviews.author: Darrien Glasser

reviews.title: Nice refresh, except the icon
reviews.comment: Like the new styling, except the icon, the true original is still better.
reviews.author: Steven Hunter

reviews.title: Good but yet perfect
reviews.comment: Please add recurrence ability to reminder like every 3 weeks, every Saturday &  Sunday etc.... And let us choose the notification sound please... Please have a look at COL reminder apps as they got quite a few things right : phone call reminder,  snooze duration & date setting from notification, backup capabilities....etc.  Just my 2 cents as I see potentials in your app.
reviews.author: Ooi Teik Leong

reviews.title: Alerts messing up?
reviews.comment: I could be missing something, but the alerts/reminders aren\'t working for me. I make sure they are on, but never get alerted.  Everything else is perfect though.
reviews.author: Clay Cauley

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would like more options
reviews.author: Luis Zetina

reviews.title: New logo? UGH.
reviews.comment: Great app, useful, updated frequently. Developer strangely adept at finding increasingly horrible icons.
reviews.author: Darren Meier
